text: Mikołaj Kubica (27 October 1945 - 19 July 2020) was a Polish gymnast. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics, the 1968 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Niedobczyce, Poland. Kubica died on 19 July 2020, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Polish gymnasts
title: Mikołaj Kubica
